name: comment
content:
A space to write a description of your code.

Comments are used to describe how your code works so it is easier for humans to understand. It is also a good idea to comment any complex blocks of code so you, or another programmer, can more easily understand the code in the future.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: Comments can describe what happens when the code is run or an event happens.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: Comments can help you track variables and change sprite properties.

palette_params.name: text
palette_params.description: Click inside the block to type any text

short_description: A space to write a description of your code.
tips: - It is a good computer science practice to make comments on your code. They help you and others understand your code. Writing comments can even help you spot bugs.
